title: What are some of the reasons for breaking big tech companies? - Quora

response.answer_text: The #1 reason as a matter of anti-trust is abuse and unfair manipulation of markets. That’s flat out illegal. Markets must be as free as possible or they do not work as markets (of finding the best allocation of resources at the best price). Companies make the mistake of becoming monopolies subject to anti-trust because it’s easier to make profits that way. But it’s fundamentally unfair, illegal and morally despicable.
